title: Log Project Meeting Minutes
description: Following the weekly project review meeting, the project administrator needs to log the meeting minutes and track the new action items.

tasks.description: Create a new meeting record in the project management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully initiates a new meeting record.

tasks.description: Upload the meeting minutes document and list the attendees.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent attaches the minutes and adds the attendees to the record.

tasks.description: For each action item discussed, create a new task in the system and assign it to the responsible person with a due date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates three new action items, each assigned to a different team member.
